system.description: You do not enter your torchbearer form with subtlety, and instead burst out with sound and fury. You add the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.65ksar78lxxp7uol]{Thunderwave} to your list of known wielder spells. In addition, when you use a bonus action to enter your torchbearer form you may choose to cast the spell thunderwave at 1st level without expending any additional artifact charges as a part of the same bonus action.
